txt.en: The Orcs of the Redhorn are busy mining ore and have built sluice-boxes to help them filter the ore from the dirt. Destroying the sluice-boxes throughout the Redhorn Lodes can only help to slow down the Orcs' mining operations.

The Orcs may be able to repair these sluice-boxes over time, but hopefully they will have more to deal with before they get a chance to make the repairs. This is the first step in slowing down the Orcs' Redhorn mining operations.
'There are sluice-boxes throughout the Orc's mining areas? You've done so much already and I hate to ask another of you, but the fewer things to worry about, the better.'
The sluice boxes used by both the Moria and White Hand Orcs to filter the mined ore should not be left functional. Destroying them will help slow down the Orcs' production of weapons and armour.
Orcs are using sluice-boxes found at the bases of the elevated tracks throughout the Redhorn Lodes, south-east of the Orc-watch.
Orcs are using sluice-boxes found at the bases of the elevated tracks throughout the Redhorn Lodes, south-east of the Orc-watch.
